ItinerarySegment.Title: Arrive in Athens, Greece
ItinerarySegment.Text: The day is free to begin exploring.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Athens Sightseeing & Free Time
ItinerarySegment.Text: Morning sightseeing includes a walking tour of the Acropolis with a Local Guide and more. The afternoon is at leisure.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Athens / Lavrion / Cruising
ItinerarySegment.Text: The morning is free before a late afternoon transfer to Lavrion. Here, board your ship and cruise towards Turkey.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Cruising: Istanbul, Turkey
ItinerarySegment.Text: Relax on board as you cruise to Istanbul. Later, arrive to views of mosques and minarets.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Cruising: Mykonos
ItinerarySegment.Text: A full day free to enjoy this fabled island. On Day 6 the option to overnight in Mykonos is available on request. Ask your Cruise Representative in Athens.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Cruising: Lavrion / Mykonos
ItinerarySegment.Text: Relax on board your ship, visit the casino, take a dip in the pool â€“ the choice is yours on a day of cruising.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Cruising: Patmos / Kusadasi
ItinerarySegment.Text: Stop at little Patmos for a visit, then cruise to Turkish Kusadasi. Here you might want to join an optional excursion to ancient Ephesus.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Cruising: Rhodes
ItinerarySegment.Text: Arrive early in Rhodes. Perhaps take an excursion to the old town and Lindos, or just sunbathe on the beach.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Cruising: Heraklion / Santorini
ItinerarySegment.Text: Your first stop is at Heraklion on the island of Crete. Next, set sail to idyllic Santorini.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Disembark lavrion / Athens
ItinerarySegment.Text: Disembark in Lavrion and transfer to your hotel in Athens. The rest of the day is free.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Depart Athens
ItinerarySegment.Text: You will be transferred to the airport where your vacation ends.
